item.title: OPPO empowers Singaporeans to discover the ultimate experience with #UncoverTheUltimate
item.description: Last week, OPPO, a global provider of smart devices, introduced its latest lineup of smartphones, including the brand’s first 5G offering, the Find X2 Pro 5G, and a new addition to its creative Reno series, the Reno3. This unveiling follows the global online launch of the Find X2 series on March 6. The Find X2 Pro boasts a 120 Hz QHD AMOLED screen, 65 W SuperVOOC Flash Charge 2.0 technology, and the Qualcomm Snapdragon 865 processor, delivering an enhanced overall photography and video experience.
